13.m: But Jesus rebuked him, saying, 'Be silent, and come out of him!'. -Mark 1:25 (ESV)

l.q: In this scripture passage, where was Jesus and what was he doing?
l.a: Jesus was at Capernaum. It was the Sabbath, and he was teaching at the synagogue.

l.q: What does verse 24 tell us about the unclean spirit?
l.a: Verse 24 tell us that the unclean spirit knows who Jesus is. The unclean spirit torments and hurts its host, the man.

l.q: What do verses 25-26 tell us about Jesus?
l.a: Verses 25-26 tell us that Jesus has authority on unclean spirits. And unclean spirits obey Him. In the end of times these unclean spirits will get their punishment from God.

s.h:
A new born king to see
Pa rum pum pum pum

13.a: Enjoy a cup of warm chocolate or apple cider with someone who lives with you.
